translation.en: In early ( around 5 years ) after the pathopoiesis, and there are no heart and renal disturbance, and the postoperative course of patients whose nutritional state is good is good.

translation.ja: ＦＡＰは遺伝子診断の普及と治療としての肝移植の導入により難病から脱却できるとの認識があると述べた。
translation.en: FAP is described with the recognition that can get out of the intractable disease by the popularization of gene diagnosis and introduction of liver transplantation as treatment.

translation.ja: 日常検査上で非特異反応を経験することは稀ではあるが，原因検索まで検討し試薬改良することは皆無である。
translation.en: A non-specific reaction is rarely experienced in routine test, and it never ocuurs to investigate it to the cause retrieval and improve the reagent.

translation.ja: 今回，血液疾患でＨＢｓ抗原（Ａｇ）およびＨＢｅ抗原の測定において非特異反応の原因を検討し，試薬の改良を経験したので紹介した。
translation.en: Recently, we have examined the cause of non-specific reaction in the measurement of HBs antigen (Ag) and HBe antigen in hematologic disease, and experienced an improvement of reagent.

translation.ja: 測定は１９９７年６月よりＥＬＩＳＡ（酵素免疫測定法）を原理としたＥＬＳＩＡ‐Ｆ７５０自動免疫測定装置によりＨＢｓ抗原，抗体（Ａｂ），ＨＢｅ抗原，抗体およびＨＣＶ抗体の測定を開始した。
translation.en: From June, 1997, the measurement of HBs antigen, antibody (Ab), HBe antigen, antibody and HCV antibody by ELSIA-F750 automatic immunity measuring device on the principle of ELISA (enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay) was started.

translation.ja: 症例は，未治療の急性骨髄性白血病で骨髄移植を目的に入院した患者の感染症検査で，ＨＢｓＡｇ，ＨＢｅＡｇ試薬の非特異反応により診断を誤り，Ｂ型肝炎の初期感染疑いとして報告した例である。
translation.en: The case was in a patient of untreated acute myeloid leukemia, who was hospitalized for the purpose of bone marrow transplantation, wrongly diagnosed by the non-specific reaction of HBsAg and HBeAg reagent in the infection test, and reported as suspected of initial stage of hepatitis B infection.

translation.ja: 測定過程および各試薬組成から一次反応で既に非特異物質が結合しているかの確認と項目間における試薬組成による違いをみることを目的に，抗体蛋白質が結合していないＦ‐７５０の専用測定容器で各項目を測定した。
translation.en: For the purpose of confirmation of whether the unspecific substance has already combined in the primary reaction from measurement process and each reagent composition and checking of the difference in each item according to the reagent composition, each item was measured by an exclusive measurement container of F-750 to which antibody protein has not combined.

translation.ja: 検討の結果，非特異反応の回避は，ＨＢｓＡｇ，ＨＢｅＡｇ緩衝液に１％のカゼイン添加あるいはブロッキング剤の変更で可能であった。
translation.en: As a result of the examination, the avoidance of the non-specific reaction was possible by an addition of 1% casein solution to the HBsAg, HBeAg buffer solution, or a change of the blocking agent.

translation.ja: 近年，生活習慣の変化により，非アルコール性脂肪性肝障害（ＮＡＦＬＤ）が急増している。
translation.en: Recently, non-alcoholic fatty hepatic disorder (NAFLD) has increased rapidly by the change of the lifestyle habit.

translation.ja: ＮＡＦＬＤの病因は肥満とインシュリン抵抗性が主で，殆どの症例が生活習慣病を合併している。
translation.en: Obesity and insulin resistance are main for the etiology of NAFLD, and most case has complicated lifestyle-related diseases.

translation.ja: ＮＡＦＬＤは殆どが脂肪肝で病態が進行することはないが，その約１割は非アルコール性脂肪性肝炎（ＮＡＳＨ）であり，肝硬変や肝細胞癌（ＨＣＣ）に進行する。
translation.en: Though in NAFLD, the disease state seldom does not progress in as of fatty liver, the about 10% is nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH), and it progresses in liver cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).

translation.ja: 本稿ではＮＡＦＬＤ及びＮＡＳＨの自然経過について述べ，ＮＡＳＨの線維化とその重症度予測因子及び肝硬変について述べ，肥満とＮＡＳＨの関連及びＮＡＳＨとＨＣＣの関連について述べた。
translation.en: In this paper, natural course of NAFLD and NASH was described, and fibrillation of NASH and the seriousness predictor and liver cirrhosis were described, and the relation of obesity and NASH,and relation of NASH and HCC was described.

translation.ja: ５４歳および８４歳女性の標記の症例を報告した。
translation.en: Two cases with the above-mentioned disease in 54-year-old and 84-year-old women were reported.

translation.ja: 症例１においては，卵巣がんの手術後，化学療法中に抗がん剤が血管外漏出し，発赤，硬結，皮膚潰ようを生じた。
translation.en: In case 1, extravasation of anti-cancer drugs during chemical therapy, after operation of ovarian cancer, caused reddening, induration, and skin ulcer.

translation.ja: 症例２においては，直腸がんの肝転移に対する化学療法中に，発赤，硬結，皮膚潰ようを生じた。
translation.en: In case 2, reddening, induration, and skin ulcer appeared during chemical therapy for liver metastasis of rectal cancer.

translation.ja: 両症例とも保存療法を施行した。
translation.en: The conservative treatment was applied to both cases.

translation.ja: 病変の境界が明確になったところで，手術療法を行った。
translation.en: When the boundary of the lesion became clear, the surgical treatment was enforced.

translation.ja: 両症例とも，術後の経過は良好であった。
translation.en: In both the cases, postoperative course were good.

translation.ja: 対麻ひを生じた腰部脊柱管狭窄症の３例について，術後成績とそれに関わる因子と検討した。
translation.en: 3 cases of the lumbar spinal canal stenosis which produced the paraplegia were examined with the factor which is related to postoperative result and it it.

translation.ja: 症例は８６歳女性，７３歳男性，７３歳女性の３例である。
translation.en: Cases are the 86-year-old women, and they are the 3 examples 73 -year-old man 73 -year-old woman.

translation.ja: ３例とも術後に有意な麻ひの改善を認めなかった。
translation.en: The improvement on the significant paralysis in the postoperative 3 cases was not accepted.

translation.ja: 症例１と２は手術までの期間が長かったことが，成績不良因子であったと考える。
translation.en: It is considered that that the period to the operation was long for case of 1 and 2 was the result bad factor.

translation.ja: 一方，症例３では手術までの期間が短かったものの，ＭＭＴ１の高度な麻ひがあったために成績が不良であったと考える。
translation.en: In the meantime, it is considered that the result was bad, since there was the advanced paralysis of MMT1, though the period to the operation was short in cases of 3.

translation.ja: 以上から，７０歳以上の高齢者で，ぼうこう機能障害を伴う馬尾型を含む病態では手術までの期間が長い症例，麻ひが高度である症例は手術によって必ずしも麻ひの有意な改善が得られないと考える。
translation.en: It is considered that the improvement on the paralysis of which the case in which the period to the operation is long and case with the advanced paralysis are not always significant by the operation in the elderly over 70-year-old from them in the disease state including cauda equina type with the bladder dysfunction is not obtained.

translation.ja: 国立病院機構関門医療センター（国立下関病院）は２００２年９月３０日に女性総合診療を開設した。
translation.en: A National Hospital System Kanmon Medical Center (A National Shimonoseki Hospital) opened the comprehensive woman medical care service on September 30th in 2002.

translation.ja: 開設から２００５年１０月３１日までの３年１カ月に初診患者数は８０８名を数えた。
translation.en: The number of initial diagnosis patients was counted 808 in 3 years and 1 month from the establishment to October 31st in 2005.

translation.ja: 開設の経緯，診療の流れ，受診者のニーズ，診療概要，院内外のネットワークについて概説した。
translation.en: The following were outlined: History of the establishment, flow of medical care, needs of visitors for medical examination, outline of medical care, and networks of outside and inside of the hospital.

translation.ja: また現在の課題（人材育成と医師の自己研さん，性差医学へのフィードバック），今後の展望について概要した。
translation.en: And, present problems (talent training and self study of doctors, feedback to the gender specific medicine) and future prospect were outlined.

translation.ja: スクリーニングＭＲＩを再検討し，特に感染性脊髄炎と診断された症例について最も頻度が高いと思われる椎間板高信号について検討した。
translation.en: The screening MRI was reexamined, and especially, the intervertebral disk high signal of the case diagnosed as an infectivity myelitis was examined.

translation.ja: 腰椎ＭＲＩ６８４件（男性３５５，女性３４９件，５か月〜８９歳）のＴ２強調画像のうち，２９８件に椎間板高信号を呈する症例を認めた。
translation.en: The cases presenting the intervertebral disk high signal were recognized in 298 out of 684 T2 stress images of the lumbar MRI (355 men, 349 women of 5 months to 89-year-old).

translation.ja: 化膿性脊椎炎の所見に準じ，Ｔ２強調画像での椎間板の形状と高信号パターンを７パターンに分類した。
translation.en: The shape and high signal pattern of the intervertebral disk in T2 stress image were classified into 7 patterns, referring to the opinion on the purulent spondylitis.

translation.ja: その結果，典型的信号強度とされるへん平化不整形低信号椎間板内点状高信号のＴパターンを呈しながら化膿性脊椎炎のような印象を持たない症例が８例あった。
translation.en: As the result, there were 8 cases which presented T pattern of point state high signal in the flattening unmade low signal intervertebral disk to be the typical signal strength but showed no impression like the purulent spondylitis.

translation.ja: これらの症例では軟部組織肥厚や終板信号強度異常は見られなかった。
translation.en: The soft tissue hyperplasia and abnormality in end plate signal strength could not be observed in these cases.

translation.ja: 他にも変形性腰椎症や圧迫骨折でよく見られるパターンや正常椎間板や腰椎椎間板ヘルニアで見られるパターンを呈している症例もあり，軟部影，錐体異常信号強度とあわせ，総合的に診断する必要がある。
translation.en: In addition, there are some cases presenting the patterns observed often in deformative lumbar disease and compressed fracture and patterns observed in normal intervertebral disk and lumber vertebrae herniated disk, and it is necessary to synthetically diagnose with soft part shadow and pyramid abnormal signal strength.

translation.ja: 手根管症候群（ＣＴＳ）に対する保存療法の適応は，初診時の重症度，り病期間，年齢，しびれ感などの自覚症状などによって異なる。
translation.en: Indication of conservative treatment for carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) is different from seriousness of subjective symptoms, contraction periods, age and numbness in the initial diagnosis.

translation.ja: とう痛を主訴とする老人には保存療法に固守せず手術を勧める場合もある。
translation.en: Surgery may advise for elderly persons with pain as a chief complaint without adherence of conservative treatment operation.

translation.ja: 保存療法の実際として，ステロイド剤注射と装具療法とを比較した。
translation.en: Steroid injection is compared with the apparatus therapy as a practice of the conservative treatment.

translation.ja: いずれも同等の治療効果が期待できるが，ステロイド剤では合併症や再発の可能性がある。
translation.en: Equivalent therapy effect can be also expected, but there is the possibility of complication and recurrence in the steroid therapy.

translation.ja: ＣＴＳは中高年の女性に多く，手のオーバーユースがある場合には生活指導が重要である。
translation.en: CTS is abounding for the elderly woman and the life guidance is important when there is an overuse of the hand.

translation.ja: 持続的な強いしびれ感やとう痛があれば手術を勧める。
translation.en: Surgery is advised if there are continuous and strong numbness and pain.

translation.ja: 乳癌外来で汎用される経口抗癌剤の副作用とその対策について概説した。
translation.en: This paper outlines side effects of the oral anticancer drug used widely in mammary cancer ambulatory treatment and measures.

translation.ja: 乳癌治療における経口抗癌剤の位置づけを述べた。
translation.en: Positioning of the oral anticancer drug in the mammary cancer treatment is described.

translation.ja: 経口抗癌剤の特徴的な副作用とその対策として，代謝きっ抗薬（食欲不振，悪心・おう吐，骨髄抑制など），及びアルキル化剤（出血性ぼうこう炎など）を挙げた。
translation.en: As the characteristic side effects of oral anticancer drugs and the measures, antimetabolites (anorexia, nausea and vomiting, bone marrow suppression, etc.), and alkylating agents (hemorrhagic cystitis, etc.) are cited.

translation.ja: 更に，相互作用と服薬指導時におけるポイントを示した。
translation.en: In addition, interactions and points in the case of patient compliance instruction are shown.

translation.ja: 熱傷時の臨床的パラメーターとしての血清インターロイキン１８（ＩＬ‐１８）濃度の有用性を検討した。
translation.en: The usefulness of the serum interleukin 18 (IL-18) concentration as a clinical parameter in the burn was examined.

translation.ja: 対象患者２５名は生存２２名，死亡３名で，全熱傷面積（ＴＢＳＡ）は平均２７．１％（１〜９３％），熱傷指数（ＢＩ）は平均１９．６であった。
translation.en: The 25 patients for object were 22 survived and 3 dead, and total burn section area (TBSA) was 27.1% in average (1 to 93%), and burn index (BI) was 19.6 in average.

translation.ja: ＩＬ‐１８濃度は，ＴＢＳＡ，ＢＩ，白血球数と受傷１日目は負の相関を示し，受傷７日目ではＴＢＳＡ，ＢＩ，白血球数，Ｃ反応性蛋白質と正の相関を示した。
translation.en: The IL-18 concentration showed TBSA, BI, leukocyte count and negative correlation on the first day after the burn and showed TBSA, BI, leukocyte count, C-reactive protein and positive correlation on the 7th day after the burn.

translation.ja: 酸素化指数とは負の，重症度（ＳＯＦＡスコア）とは正の相関を示した。
translation.en: It showed the negative correlation with the oxygenation index and the positive correlation with the seriousness (SOFA score).

translation.ja: また生存者の平均は３３４ｐｇ／ｍＬであったのに対し，死亡者の平均は６２６ｐｇ／ｍＬと，生存者の平均値の方が死亡者より低値であった。
translation.en: And, the average of the deceased was 626pg/mL, while the average of the survived was 334pg/mL and the average value of the survived was lower than that of the deceased.

translation.ja: 血清ＩＬ‐１８濃度は熱傷による炎症反応の臨床的パラメーターとして有用である可能性が示唆された。
translation.en: The possibility that the serum IL-18 concentration was useful as a clinical parameter of the inflammatory reaction by the burn was indicated.

translation.ja: 人工股関節置換術（ＴＨＡ）による成績は中期的には安定している。
translation.en: Results by total hip arthroplasty (THA) has been stabilized.

translation.ja: 整形外科医にとっては，合併症を生じないようにすることが重要な責務である。
translation.en: It is an important duty that it would not produce complications for orthopedists.

translation.ja: 術後脱臼の病態について解説した。
translation.en: Disease state of the postoperative dislocation is explained.

translation.ja: 脱臼の要因は，ソケットと骨頭間の求心力不足と衝突（インピンジメント）の２つである。
translation.en: Dislocation are two factors of insufficient centripetal force and collision (impingement) between socket and bone caput.

translation.ja: 発生原因には，ソケットやステムのコンポーネント設置異常，遺残した骨棘による骨盤と大腿骨の衝突，ソケット辺縁部とステム頚部の衝突，軟部組織の緊張不十分が考えられる。
translation.en: Generation causes are considered as follows: the tension inadequate of component installation abnormality of the socket and stem, collision of the femur and pelvis by the retention of bone spur, collision of the socket marginal region and stem cervix and soft tissues.

translation.ja: また，外転筋群の機能不全，筋力低下，大転子の癒合不全，過度の外力などもある。
translation.en: There are some malfunction of the abductor groups, loss of muscle strength, dysraphia of great trochanter and excessive external force.

translation.ja: 遺伝性の補体第３因子（Ｃ３）欠損症は極めてまれな疾患である。
translation.en: Hereditary third complement factor (C3) deficiency is a very rare disease.

translation.ja: 今回，学校検尿で異常を認めた７歳男児の血液検査の結果，Ｃ３：０ｍｇ／ｄｌ，Ｃ４：１８ｍｇ／ｄｌ，ＣＨ５０：１６Ｕ／ｍｌを認めた。
translation.en: A seven year-old boy at a recent school urine test showed 0mg/dl of C3, 18mg/dl of C4, and 16U/ml of CH50.

translation.ja: 両親が血縁関係にあることから遺伝性Ｃ３欠損症を疑い，家族，兄弟について検索した。
translation.en: The results and the fact that his parents were related suggested he had hereditary C3 deficiency, and his family members including his siblings were called in for checkup.

translation.ja: 遺伝子解析の結果，患児ではエクソン２９に二塩基欠失をホモで，両親ではヘテロで認め，遺伝性Ｃ３欠損症と診断した。
translation.en: Their gene analysis revealed homozygous 2 nucleotide deletion in exon 29 of the boy and heterozygous 2 nucleotide deletion in exon 29 of the parents, which convinced the researchers the boy had hereditary C3 deficiency.

translation.ja: 文献ではこれまでに９例が報告されており，そのほとんどの例で両親が血縁，変異はホモであった。
translation.en: Most of 9 patients reported with hereditary C3 deficiency had blood-related parents, and the patients had mutation in homozygote.

translation.ja: なぜ遺伝性Ｃ３欠損症が他の補体欠損症よりも頻度が少ないのか，なぜホモ変異が多いのかを，Ｃ３分子の生合成過程からその機序を考察した。
translation.en: The relatively low incidence of hereditary C3 deficiency compared to other complement deletions, and why homozygous mutations rather than heterozygous mutation occur more frequently were investigated in the study.

translation.ja: 甲状腺中毒症について解説した。
translation.en: Thyrotoxicosis is explained.

translation.ja: 甲状腺中毒症の病因と分類，及び症状について述べた。
translation.en: This paper describes etiology and classification, and symptoms of thyrotoxicosis.

translation.ja: バセドウ病の治療（抗甲状腺剤と抗甲状腺薬の副作用，放射性ヨード療法，手術療法），プランマー病の診断と治療，ｈＣＧの刺激，ヨード誘発性，及び甲状腺ホルモン摂取による中毒症について述べた。
translation.en: Treatment of Basedow disease (antithyroid agent and side effect of antithyroid drug, radioiodine therapy, surgical remedy), diagnosis and treatment of Plummer disease, stimulation of hCG, iodine inductivity, and toxicosis by thyroid hormone intake are described.

translation.ja: 更に，研修医へのアドバイスを示した。
translation.en: In addition, the advice to the resident is shown.

translation.ja: 初めに，クリニカルパスのメリットおよびデメリットについて述べた。
translation.en: Merits and demerits of clinical pathway are described.

translation.ja: 次いで，食道癌手術に対してクリニカルパスを適用する場合の問題点，およびクリニカルパスを適応する食道癌症例について概説した。
translation.en: Problems and cases with esophageal cancer applying the clinical pathway are outlined.

translation.ja: 次に，食道癌手術に対する医療スタッフ用クリニカルパスに関して，特徴，術前管理，術後ＩＣＵ，病棟における術後管理，および経口摂取について解説した。
translation.en: Followings are explained on the clinical pathway to medical staffs for the esophageal operation: Features, preoperative care, postoperative ICU, postoperative care in a hospital room and ingestion.

translation.ja: さらに，食道癌手術に対する患者用クリニカルパスについて説明した。
translation.en: Clinical pathway for patients with esophageal cancer is explained.

translation.ja: 最後に，バリアンスの記録および分析について述べた。
translation.en: Records and analysis of variance are described.

translation.ja: バリアンスの分析により問題点を明らかにすることが，医療の質の向上に有用なことを示唆した。
translation.en: It is indicated that to clarify the problem by the analysis of variance is useful for the improvement in medical quality.

translation.ja: 死後の画像撮影を含むオートプシー・イメージング（Ａｉ）技術について解説した。
translation.en: Autopsy imaging (Ai) technology including imaging of after death was explained.

translation.ja: Ａｉ技術を利用することにより，解剖率の低下を補うことができる。
translation.en: It is possible to protect reduction of autopsy rate through utilization of Ai technology.

translation.ja: また，犯罪捜査にも威力を発揮し，死因の特定も可能となる。
translation.en: Also, it throws power to crime detection, and makes possible to identify cause of death.

translation.ja: Ａｉは病理学と画像診断学の融合したものであることを述べ，解剖との差異を示した。
translation.en: It was described that Ai was coupling of pathology with imaging diagnosis technology, and differences of Ai from anatomy were explained.

translation.ja: 福岡県久山町の住民検診を受診した１６２１名のうち，アンジオテンシン変換酵素遺伝子多型を判定することのできた９３７名について３２年間追跡した。
translation.en: Out of 1,621 people who had medical examination in the inhabitant detection survey of Hisayama Town in Fukuoka Prefecture, 937 people who were able to be judged of the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene polymorphism were followed up for 32 years.

translation.ja: アンジオテンシン変換酵素遺伝子多型は，生存例の血液標本，剖検例のパラフィン標本および新鮮凍結標本からＤＮＡを抽出し，ＰＣＲ法により判定した。
translation.en: The angiotensin-converting enzyme gene polymorphism was judged by the PCR method with DNA extracted from blood samples of the survival cases, paraffin samples of the pathologic autopsy cases and fresh frozen samples.

translation.ja: 追跡期間中に１７６名が悪性腫瘍により死亡した。
translation.en: During the follow-up period 176 people died by malignant tumor.

translation.ja: 悪性腫瘍により死亡率は，喫煙レベルの増加と共に上昇した。
translation.en: The death rate by malignant tumor increased with increase of the smoking level.

translation.ja: アンジオテンシン変換酵素遺伝子多型別に喫煙と腫瘍死の関連を検討したところ，ＤＤ型における喫煙の影響は，ＩＩ型やＩＤ型における関連よりも約２倍大きかった。
translation.en: Study of the relation between smoking and tumor death for each angiotensin-converting enzyme gene polymorphism indicated about double smoking effect of DD type compared with II and ID types.

translation.ja: 喫煙の腫瘍死に対する影響は，アンジオテンシン変換酵素遺伝子多型により異なることが示唆された。
translation.en: It was indicated that the effect of smoking on tumor death was different depending on the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene polymorphism.

translation.ja: 当院ではすべての入院患者を対象に効率的に持参薬をチェックするシステムを検討し，２００５年４月から医事課入院受付係の前に「持参薬確認コーナー」を新設した。
translation.en: In this hospital, the system which efficiently checked the bringing medicine for all hospitalized patient was examined, and it set up "the bringing medicine confirmation corner" before medical business section hospitalization receiving clerk from April, 2005.

translation.ja: 本稿では，患者の入院予定時間にあわせて同コーナーヘ薬剤師を配置した持参薬チェック業務を紹介した。
translation.en: In this paper, bringing medicine check business which in addition, it stationed the pharmacist in the same corner for the patient hospitalization schedule hour was introduced.

translation.ja: 新たな当院のシステムでは，わずか２時間で１日の入院患者の約８割をチェックでき，さらに同コーナーでのチェックだけで持参薬あり患者の約９１％が確認できることを示した。
translation.en: It was shown that in the system of new this hospital, it could check patient about 8 ×10% of the daily hospitalization patient in slight 2 hours, and in addition, that it can confirm about 91% of the bringing medicine have patient only in a check in the same corner.

translation.ja: 当院のシステムは効率的な持参薬チェックシステムの一つで，患者に薬剤師の職能を最もアピールできるタイミングでもあると述べた。
translation.en: The system of this hospital was one of the efficient bringings medicine check system, and it was explained that it was the timing to which the patient can appeal for the occupational ability of the pharmacist most too.

translation.ja: ジェネリック医薬品（ＧＥ医薬品）のシェアが高まり，より多くの国民に使用される機会が増えるにつれて，ＧＥ医薬品企業の社会的責任も重くなってきている。
translation.en: With a share of Generic Drugs ( the GE medical supply ) heightening, and the opportunity used for more many nations increasing, the social responsibility of the GE medical supply enterprise becomes also heavy.

translation.ja: 沢井製薬株式会社は，ＧＥ医薬品を製造・販売する企業の先頭に立ち，これまでＧＥ医薬品の存在とその社会的意義について種々のメディアを通じて国民にプロモーションしてきた。
translation.en: Sawai Pharmaceutical Co. and Ltd. is left to the head in the enterprise that produces and sells the GE medical supply, and its promotion is done until now to the nation on existence of GE medical supply and the social meaning through various media.

translation.ja: 本稿では，当社のＧＥ医薬品の取り組みについて概説した。
translation.en: In this paper, the challenge of GE medical supply of our company was outlined.

translation.ja: 今後は，ＧＥ医薬品の使用促進を求める活動だけではなく，ＧＥ医薬品の品質を含めた信頼性を高める努力が必要と述べた。
translation.en: Not only activity of the GE medical supply in search of the use promotion in future but also the effort which raises the reliability including the quality of the GE medical supply described it with the necessity.

translation.ja: ４５歳女性におけるアカツキ病の症例について報告した。
translation.en: A case of a 45-year-old woman with Akatuki disease was reported.

translation.ja: 新しい化粧品を使用後，顔に皮疹が認められるようになった。
translation.en: Efflorescence was observed in her face, after she used new cosmetics.

translation.ja: ステロイド内服，ステロイド軟膏と亜鉛華軟膏の外用を施行した。
translation.en: Oral administration of steroid, and external use of steroid and zinc ointment were performed.

translation.ja: 投与２か月後症状は改善した。
translation.en: Her symptoms were improved a month after the administration.

translation.ja: 化粧品のパッチテストは陽性であった。
translation.en: The cosmetics were positive for patch test.

translation.ja: 化粧品による接触皮膚炎，およびアカツキ病が疑われた。
translation.en: Contact dermatitis and Akatuki disease due to the cosmetics were suspected.

translation.ja: ＲＳＤの病態は一様ではないので，病態に見合った治療法の選択が必要である。
translation.en: Selection of the therapy is necessary which is suitable for the disease state, because the disease state of RSD is not uniform.

translation.ja: 痛みの機序を判定する１つの方法として，薬理学的疼痛機序判別試験（ＤＣＴ）について述べた。
translation.en: As one method for judging the pain mechanism, drug challenged test (DCT) is described.

translation.ja: 神経因性疼痛の発生機序としては，異所性神経発火の発生，交感神経の関与，脊髄後角における変化，二次ニューロンの感作と痛みの記憶について概説した。
translation.en: As an occurrence mechanism of neurogenic pain, the followings are outlined: Generation of heterotopia nerve ignition, involvement of sympathetic nerve, change in posterior horn of spinal cord, sensitization of the secondary neuron and memory of pain.

translation.ja: ＤＣＴの方法について解説した。
translation.en: Method of the DCT is explained.

translation.ja: 試験薬物にはフェントラミン，モルヒネ，リドカイン，あるいはナロキソンを用いる。
translation.en: Phentolamine, morphine, lidocaine or naloxone are used for the test agents.

translation.ja: その後の治療法について言及した。
translation.en: Therapy is mentioned afterwards.

translation.ja: 特発性肺線維症（ＩＰＦ）患者１４例及びＩＰＦ急性増悪で入院した患者８例を対象として，ＢＡＬＦ・血漿に関してウィルス検査・免疫血清学的検査を施行した。
translation.en: The virus inspection and immunoserologic inspection of BALF and blood plasma were carried out for 14 idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis (IPF) patients and of 8 patients hospitalized for IPF acute aggravation.

translation.ja: ＩＰＦ安定期と比較して急性増悪期に有意にＢＡＬＦ中で増加しているサイトカインは，測定した１７種類虫１３種類で，ＩＬ‐６，ＴＮＦα，ＩＦＮγは特に予後不良例で高い傾向を示した。
translation.en: The cytokine which significantly increased in BALF in the acute aggravation stage compared with the IPF stable stage was high in 13 types out of 17 type measured, and especially IL-6, TNFα and IFNγ tended to be high in the poor prognosis cases.

translation.ja: 急性増悪治療経過中にＢＡＬＦを再検できた３例で，ＩＬ‐２，ＩＬ‐５，ＩＬ‐６は治療により予後に関わらず低下する傾向を示し，ＩＬ‐８，ＩＦＮγ，ＴＮＦαは予後不良例で上昇傾向を示した。
translation.en: In 3 cases of BALF reexamination during the acute aggravation treating process, IL-2, IL-5 and IL-6 showed decreasing tendencies by the treatment regardless of prognosis, and IL-8, IFNγ and TNFα showed the upward tendencies in the poor prognosis cases.

translation.ja: 血漿中では，ＩＬ‐６，ＩＬ‐７，ＩＬ‐８，ＩＬ‐１０が安定期と比べ急性増悪時に有意に上昇した。
translation.en: In the blood plasma, IL-6, IL-7, IL-8 and IL-10 significantly increased in the acute aggravation stage compared with the stable stage.

translation.ja: 気管支喘息の基本病態は慢性の気道炎症である。
translation.en: The basic disease state of bronchial asthma is chronic airway inflammation.

translation.ja: 気道炎症には，好酸球，Ｔ細胞，肥満細胞，好中球，マクロファージ，気道上皮をはじめとする多くの細胞と種々の液性因子が関与する。
translation.en: In airway inflammation, various cells such as eosinophils, T-cells, mast cells, neutrophils, macrophages and airway epithelium, and various liquid factors are involved.

translation.ja: 気道炎症の部位は中枢気道のみならず末梢気道でもＴｈ２サイトカインが関与していることが重要視されている。
translation.en: It is taken seriously that Th2 cytokine is involved not only in central airway, but also in peripheral airway, in the position of airway inflammation.

translation.ja: さらに気道上皮細胞の剥離と胚細胞化，基底膜肥厚，気道平滑筋の肥大・過形成，血管新生といった気道リモデリングの病態が明らかになり，不可逆的な気道閉塞をもたらし，気道過敏性を慢性的に亢進させ，喘息の重症・難治化の原因となる。
translation.en: In addition, the disease states of airway remodeling such as the peeling of tracheal epithelial cell and turning into embryonic cell, basal membrane thickening, hypertrophy and hyperplasia of tracheal smooth muscle, and angiogenesis are clarified, which bring about irreversible airway closure and chronically intensify airway anaphylaxia to cause the asthma to become serious and intractable.

translation.ja: 喘息の治療にはアレルギー性炎症の制御に加えて気道のリモデリングを抑制するために，吸入ステロイド薬を中心とした抗炎症薬が早期から導入されることが重要である。
translation.en: For the treatment of asthma, it is important to introduce antiinflammatory drugs, mainly inhalation steroids, from the early stage, for the suppression of the remodeling of airway in addition to the control of allergic inflammation.

translation.ja: 気管支喘息は発作性の喘鳴，呼吸困難，咳が反復して起こり，これらが夜間や早朝に出現しやすいことを特徴とし，聴診所見では連続性ラ音，特に高調性笛様音である。
translation.en: The features of bronchial asthma are repeated paroxysmal stridor, dyspnea and cough, which tend to appear at night and in early morning, and in the auscultation finding, the sound is continuous A, especially harmonic flute-like sound.

translation.ja: さらに喘息の診断には呼吸機能検査による気流制限の客観的評価が必要である。
translation.en: In addition, objective evaluation of air flow restriction by a respiratory function test is necessary for the diagnosis of asthma.

translation.ja: スパイロメトリーやピークフローメーターで評価し，気道過敏性試験を行う。
translation.en: It is evaluated by spirometry or peak flow meter, and airway hypersensitivity test is performed.

translation.ja: 気道炎症の評価は，喀痰検査，呼気中一酸化窒素濃度測定，呼気凝縮液測定，さらにはアレルギー学的検査で行う。
translation.en: The evaluation of airway inflammation is performed by sputum test, measurement of nitrogen monoxide concentration in the expiration, expiration condensate measurement, and allergological examination.

translation.ja: 慢性閉塞性肺疾患，左心不全，過換気症候群など喘鳴と呼吸困難を来たす疾患が鑑別の対象となる。
translation.en: The diseases which cause stridor and dyspnea, such as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, insufficiency of left heart and hyperventilation syndrome are the object of the differentiation.

translation.ja: １）気流制限に由来する症状が発作性反復性に生じること，２）気流制限に少なくとも部分的に可逆性があること，３）他の疾患が除外されていることが臨床診断上重要である。
translation.en: What are important in the clinical diagnosis are, 1) that a symptom which derives from air flow restriction occurs paroxysmally and repeatedly, 2) that reversibility is shown, at least partially, in the air flow restriction, and 3) that other diseases are excluded.

translation.ja: 我々の遺伝子解析の結果，ＩＬ‐１７Ｆ遺伝子は喘息の病態において重要な役割を果たしている可能性が推測された。
translation.en: As a result of our genetic analysis, the possibility that IL-17F gene fulfills an important role in the disease state of asthma is guessed.

translation.ja: ＰＡＩ‐１は気道のリモデリングの形成に深く関与している可能性があり，ＰＡＩ‐１遺伝子の機能的な多型は，気道のリモデリングが進行し易いかどうかを規定している遺伝因子の一つと考えられる。
translation.en: PAI-1 may be deeply involved in the formation of airway remodeling, and the functional polymorphism of PAI-1 gene seems to be one of the genetic factors which regulate whether airway remodeling easily progresses or not.

translation.ja: ＣＣＬ５はウイルス感染時に気道上皮から強く誘導されるケモカインであり，特に高齢者喘息における慢性気道炎症の獲得に重要な役割を果たしている可能性がある。
translation.en: CCL5 is a chemokine induced strongly from airway epithelium in viral infection, and especially, it may fulfil an important role for the acquisition of chronic airway inflammation in high-age asthma.

translation.ja: マクロファージ遊走阻止因子の役割に注目したところ，アレルギーの病態に自然免疫系が深く関与していることが推察された。
translation.en: When the attention was paid to the role of macrophage inhibitory factor, it was guessed that natural immune system is deeply involved in the disease state of allergy.

translation.ja: 以上から病態生理学的な共通経路が分子レベルで明らかになることで疾患の理解が深まった。
translation.en: From the above, the understanding of the disease was deepened by clarifying the pathophysiological common pathway at the molecular level.

translation.ja: これらの経路をターゲットにすることで，喘息予防や治療の進歩に貢献することを期待したい。
translation.en: By making these pathways to be a target, it is expected to contribute to the advance in the prevention and treatment of asthma.

translation.ja: 脳動脈瘤壁の動的状態を正確に把握するために開発された心電図同期再構成ＣＴ血管造影法（４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡ）について概説する。
translation.en: We outlined the electrocardiogram synchronous reconstitution CT angiography (4 D-CTA) developed in order to understand the dynamic status of cerebral aneurysm wall correctly.

translation.ja: 多列検出器装備ＣＴ（ＭＤ‐ＣＴ）による脳動脈瘤４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡの撮影法，経頭蓋ドップラー（ＴＣＤ）を利用した拍動の最大像と最小像の推定，容積データ処理法の違いによる４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡの可視化，そして４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡサブトラクション断面再構成画像（Ｓ‐ＭＰＲ）を示した。
translation.en: The method of 4D-CTA of cerebral aneurysm using multi-sequence detector equipment CT (MD-CT), presumption of the maximum and minimum image of pulsation using transcranial doppler (TCD), visualization of 4D-CTA by the difference in a volume data processing method, and 4D-CTA subtraction section recomposition images (S-MPR) were described.

translation.ja: ４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡ　Ｓ‐ＭＰＲは画像処理に関しては客観的な脳動脈瘤画像を得ることができた。
translation.en: We are able to obtain the objective cerebral aneurysm images using 4D-CTA S-MPR.

translation.ja: ４Ｄ‐ＣＴＡ画像の問題点と活用についても述べた。
translation.en: Moreover, we described the problem and practice of 4D-CTA images.

translation.ja: 糖尿病診断のための血糖値測定は，現在，採血が不可欠である。
translation.en: Blood collection is indispensable for glucose level measurement for the diabetes mellitus diagnosis at present.

translation.ja: 非侵襲による血糖値計測の実現が望まれている。
translation.en: Realization of non-invasive glucose level measurement is desired.

translation.ja: 本稿では，ＭＲＩを使用した生体内部温度推定の基礎データの取得について報告した。
translation.en: In this paper, acquisition of basic data for the intraorganism temperature estimation using MRI is reported.

translation.ja: ミリ波領域において，導波管によって励起されたパッチアンテナを用い，共振特性を測定することで，血糖値のｉｎ　ｖｉｖｏ計測の可能性について検討した。
translation.en: In the millimeter wave region, possibility of the in vivo measurement of the glucose level by measuring the resonance characteristic using the patch antenna excited by the waveguide was examined.

translation.ja: Ｔ２位相画像の差分により，温度分布測定が実現できることを確認した。
translation.en: By the difference of the T2 phase image, it was confirmed that the temperature distribution measurement could be realized.

translation.ja: この方法は，各種治療システムなどで生体内部の非侵襲温度モニタとして活用できる。
translation.en: This system can be utilized in various medical systems as non-invasive temperature monitor of the intraorganism.

translation.ja: Ｅｎｈａｎｃｅｄ　Ｓ‐Ｃｏｎｅ　Ｓｙｎｄｒｏｍｅ（ＥＳＣＳ）の臨床像の特徴と分子遺伝学的特徴について，自験例を含めて概説した。
translation.en: The features of clinical images and molecular-genetical features of the enhanced S-cone syndrome (ESCS) were outlined including the cases.

translation.ja: ＥＳＣＳの臨床像の特徴には，夜盲の自覚，遠視の存在，嚢胞様黄斑症，血管アーケードから中間周辺部への網膜変性巣，ＥＲＧ所見として杵体反応及び３０Ｈｚフリッカ反応の減弱，フラッシュＥＲＧと錐体ＥＲＧ波形の類似などがある。
translation.en: There are consciousness of night blindness, existence of the hyperopia, cyst like maculopathy, retinal degeneration nest to the middle peripheral part from the blood vessel arcade, decreases of pestles body reaction and 30Hz flicker reaction as ERG opinion, resemblance of flash ERG and pyramids ERG waveform, etc. in features of the clinical images of ESCS.

translation.ja: 原因遺伝子は，ＮＲ２Ｅ３遺伝子である。
translation.en: The cause gene is the NR2E3 gene.

translation.ja: 自験例としては，ヘテロ接合で変異を有する両親をもつ１７歳男性患者と，視機能維持の側面からみると軽症例の３３歳女性患者を取り上げた。
translation.en: As the cases, the following were taken up : A patient of 17-year-old man with parents who had the mutation in the heterojunction and a patient of 33-year-old woman of the mild case observing from the side of visual function maintenance.

translation.ja: 症例は下腹部膨満感を主訴とする４７歳の女性であった。
translation.en: The case was a 47-year-old woman, who complained chiefly hypogastrium fullness feeling.

translation.ja: 骨盤部ＭＲＩをはじめとする諸検査によって，子宮平滑筋腫を最も疑ったが，悪性腫瘍を否定できないという術前診断により，婦人科による開腹子宮全摘術，両側付属器摘出術を施行した。
translation.en: The uterus leio myoma was suspected the most by various examinations such as a pelvis portion MRI, and the malignant tumor could not be denied in the preoperative diagnosis, and then, both laparotomy panhysterectomy and sides adnexectomy method in gynaecologia were carried out.

translation.ja: 病理組織学的に転移性子宮癌と診断し，原発病巣精査の結果，両側乳癌と判明した。
translation.en: It was diagnosed pathohistologically as a metastatic uterine cancer, and as a result of the primary lesion scanning, it was proven as the bilateral breast cancer.

translation.ja: 術前全身化学療法を施行したのち，左胸筋温存乳房切除術，左腋窩リンパ節郭清，右乳房部分切除術を施行した。
translation.en: The following were carried out after the preoperative systemic chemotherapy : Left pectorails muscle preservation ablatio mammae, left axillary lymph node purification, right mammae partial excision.

translation.ja: 左胸壁，右温存乳腺，右腋窩の３カ所に，術後放射線照射を実施した。
translation.en: The postoperative irradiation was carried out on 3 places of left parapet, right preserved mammary gland and right armpit.

translation.ja: 術後１６カ月目に腫瘍マーカーの再上昇を認め，症状の進行を阻止できず，癌性腹膜炎のため死亡した。
translation.en: The re-rise of a tumor marker was recognized in postoperative 16th month, and the progress of the symptom could not be stopped, and the case died of the carcinomatous peritonitis.

translation.ja: リシン，ボツリヌス毒素，ベロ毒素は，生物化学兵器，あるいはバイオテロへの使用が懸念されている猛毒の蛋白性毒素である。
translation.en: Ricin, botulinal toxin, and vero cytotoxin are fatally poisonous protein toxins which are feared to be used for a biochemical weapon or bioterrorism.

translation.ja: 科学警察研究所，名古屋大学工学部及び岐阜薬科大学が共同でこれら毒素の正確，迅速な検出法を開発した。
translation.en: National Research Institute of Police Science, School of Engineering of Nagoya University, and Gifu Pharmaceutical University have jointly developed an accurate rapid detection method for those toxins.

translation.ja: 糖鎖を利用した検出原理が特徴的であり，表面プラズモン共鳴（ＳＰＲ）法と組合せた方法である。
translation.en: The principle of detection is based on the usage of carbohydrate chains and surface plasmon resonance (SPR).

translation.ja: 従来法に比べ大幅に時間が短縮された信頼性の高く，操作性のよい方法である。
translation.en: This new method requires a far shorter measuring time than the conventional methods, and has high reliability and good manipulability.

translation.ja: 二分脊椎を合併した線状強皮症の１例（１６歳女性）を報告した。
translation.en: A case (16-year-old woman) of linear scleroderma with spinal bifida is reported.

translation.ja: 右臀部から大腿に線状配列する紅斑が出現した。
translation.en: Erythema with linear arrangement from the right buttock to the thigh appeared.

translation.ja: 臨床検査所見，病理組織学的所見及び画像検査所見から，二分脊椎を合併した線状強皮症と診断した。
translation.en: From clinical laboratory findings, pathohistological findings and image examination findings, linear scleroderma with spinal bifida was diagnosed.

translation.ja: フランカルボン酸モメタゾン軟膏により，やや陥凹は軽快したが，正常皮膚よりの陥凹は継続した。
translation.en: By the mometasone furancarboxylate ointment, the pit was improved a little, and the pit derived from the normal skin was continued.

translation.ja: ウエストナイルウイルス（ＷＮＶ）ＮＳ４Ｂ蛋白質は，他のウイルス蛋白質と共にインターフェロンのアンタゴニストになること，感染の後期に細胞核に局在することが報告されている。
translation.en: That it becomes an antagonist of the interferon with other viral protein and that it exists in cell nucleus in the later stage of the infection locally are reported West Nile Virus (WNV)NS4 B protein.

translation.ja: 本研究では，ＮＳ４Ｂ蛋白質の核内への局在について解析し，その生物学的意義について考察した。
translation.en: In this study, the localization of NS4 B protein to the nucleus was analyzed, and the biological significance was examined.

translation.ja: ＮＳ４Ｂ蛋白質はウイルス感染細胞のみでなく，赤色蛍光色素を付加した融合蛋白質として，非感染細胞でも核に局在することが観察された。
translation.en: It was observed that NS4 B protein existed even in not only viral infection cell but also noninfected cell as a fusion protein which added the red fluorochrome in the nucleus locally.

translation.ja: ＮＳ４Ｂ蛋白質の核移行には，本蛋白質のＣ末端５０アミノ酸が重要であることが，欠損変異体の解析から明らかとなった。
translation.en: In the nuclear translocation of NS4 B protein, that C-terminal of 50 amino acid of this protein was important changed clear the analysis of deficient mutant.

translation.ja: また，多くのＮＳ４Ｂ蛋白質が分裂細胞核に局在していることから，細胞分裂の制御に関与していることが示唆された。
translation.en: And, it was indicated to be concerned in the control of the cell division, because many NS4 B protein existed in the dividing cell nucleus locally.

translation.ja: 肝細胞癌は，同じ原発性肝癌である肝内胆管癌に比べ，リンパ節転移及び遠隔転移が少ない。
translation.en: In hepatocellular carcinoma, lymph node metastasis and remote metastasis are less than intrahepatic bile duct cancer which is the equal primary hepatic cancer.

translation.ja: しかし，しばしば多発性に腫瘤を形成しするため，治療を困難にしている。
translation.en: However, the treatment becomes difficult, since mass is often formed in the multiple.

translation.ja: 多発性の腫瘤形成は，背景となる肝病変に伴い多中心性に発生すること事が明らかになって来た。
translation.en: That simultaneously, multiple mass formation arise with the liver lesion as a background in many places is clarifying.

translation.ja: 背景に肝炎，肝硬変などを有する肝細胞癌患者については，常に多中心性発癌を念頭に置く必要がある。
translation.en: It is necessary to always have the multicenter carcinogenesis in mind on case of liver-cell carcinoma with hepatitis and liver cirrhosis, etc. in the background.

translation.ja: 本稿では，多中心性発癌に関するこれまでの知見，及び多中心性発生の実際的同定法について解説した。
translation.en: In this paper, the following were explained : Until now knowledge on the multicenter carcinogenesis and practical method of identification of the multicenter generation.

translation.ja: 肝臓は消化器系臓器からの門脈血流が最初に流入する臓器であり，消化器癌の転移頻度が最も高い臓器である。
translation.en: The liver is the organ in which the portal blood flow from the digestive system organ flows first, and it is the organ in which metastasis frequency of the digestive cancer is the highest.

translation.ja: 本稿では大腸癌を中心に転移性肝癌に対する各治療法について概説した。
translation.en: In this paper, large bowel cancer was outlined center on each therapy for metastatic liver cancer.

translation.ja: 最初に肝転移の評価法及び肝外病変の検索法について述べた。
translation.en: First the following were described : Evaluation method of hepatic metastasis and retrieval method of the liver outside lesion.

translation.ja: 次いで大腸癌肝転移の疫学について述べ，大腸癌の肝転移に関し，手術療法，動注化学療法，局所療法，全身化学療法について述べた。
translation.en: Next, the epidemiology of the hepatic metastasis of large bowel cancer was described, and on the hepatic metastasis of large bowel cancer, surgical remedy, arterial injection chemotherapy, topical treatment, systemic chemothrapy were described.

translation.ja: 最後に神経内分泌腫瘍の肝転移についての治療法について述べた。
translation.en: Finally, the therapy on the hepatic metastasis of the neuroendocrine tumor was described.

translation.ja: ５４歳の女性のｃｕｔａｎｅｏｕｓ　ｆｏｃａｌ　ｍｕｃｉｎｏｓｉｓに関する症例を報告した。
translation.en: A case with the above-mentioned disease in a 54-year-old woman was reported.

translation.ja: ２年前から左大陰唇に径１０ｍｍ大の淡紅色で光沢のある結節が出現し，徐々に拡大した。
translation.en: A rose pink, coated node with 10mm diameter had appeared on the left labia majora, and gradually increased.

translation.ja: ２ｍｍ離して単純切除した。
translation.en: Simple excision was enforced, leaving 2mm.

translation.ja: 病理組織学的所見よりｃｕｔａｎｅｏｕｓ　ｆｏｃａｌ　ｍｕｃｉｎｏｓｉｓと診断した。
translation.en: The case was diagnosed with cutaneous focal mucinosis by the pathohistological view.

translation.ja: 術後５カ月間，再発はない。
translation.en: There has been no recurrence for postoperative 5 months.

translation.ja: バセドウ病患者１８２例で血中Ｔ４を目安にするＴ３抑制試験でバセドウ病の緩解を予知した。
translation.en: A remission of exophthalmic goiter was predicted by T3 inhibition test which evaluated blood T4 as an index in 182 cases.

translation.ja: Ｔ３投与後の血中Ｔ４／Ｔ３投与前の血中Ｔ４＜６０％を緩解の指標にした。
translation.en: Blood T4 after T3 administration/blood T4 before T3 administration (<60%) was determined as an index of remission.

translation.ja: この指標を目安にすると，バセドウ病再発は抗甲状腺剤中止直後１年間は認められず，５年間で１４６例中１６例で再発を認めたにすぎなかった。
translation.en: Using this index, recurrence of Basedow disease was not recognized for one year just after discontinuction of anti‐thyroid drugs, and only 16 cases out of 146 in 5 years recurred.

translation.ja: その再発率は１１％で，他の報告に比べて極めて優れていた
translation.en: The recurrence rate was 11%, and it was much lower than the other report.

translation.ja: 同様の寒冷刺激試験を行ったにもかかわらず，月経周期によって異なる結果を示した１７歳の女子例を報告した。
translation.en: In spite of similar cold stimulation test, a female case of 17‐year‐old showed result of differing by menstrual cycle was reported.

translation.ja: 月経開始２週間前，６日前，６日後に寒冷刺激試験を続けて行い，負荷前後の血しょう中ヒスタミン値，尿中Ｎ‐メチルヒスタミン値（ＮＭＨ）を求めた。
translation.en: Cold stimulation test was carried out keepingly in 2 week, sixth before menarche, and sixth after menarch, and histamine in plasma and N‐methylhistamine (NMH) in urine before load were assayed.

translation.ja: また，月経による性ホルモンの変化についても測定した。
translation.en: And, change of sex hormone by menstruation was also assayed.

translation.ja: 尿中ＮＭＨの測定は寒冷じん麻疹の診断に有用と考えた
translation.en: Observation of NMH in urine is regarded as usefulness for diagnosis of chilly urticaria.

translation.ja: 米国では骨盤位の帝切率が１９８０年代に８０‐９０％と飛躍的に増加し，現在もほぼそのままの率を維持している。
translation.en: In the United States caesarean section rate of pelvic presentation rapidly increases in 1980's with 80‐90%, and rate was almost maintained at present.

translation.ja: 外回転術は３７週に通常行なわれる。
translation.en: External method is conducted generally in 37 weeks.

translation.ja: 外回転術が不成功に終わった症例に骨盤撮影を行なう。
translation.en: Pelvis photographing is carried out in cases in which the external method was unsuccessfully.

translation.ja: 経ちつ分娩の条件を満たした症例には試験分娩を試みるが，何か問題があると変更されることが多く，今後も帝切率が下がる状況にない
translation.en: Test of labor is made in cases which fill the condition of transvaginal parturition, but it is often change when there are problems, and there is no situation that the cesarean rate is lower in future.

translation.ja: くも膜下血術後，小脳梗塞，両側性麻ひとなった４９歳，女性の患者の看護を経験した。
translation.en: Nursing of 49‐year‐old female patient caused by cerebellar infarction and bilateral paralysis after subarachnoid blood operaion.

translation.ja: 危険の防止と異常の早期発見，ＡＤＬ（日常生活動作）の拡大と自立を看護目標として，自助具などについても工夫した。
translation.en: With the nursing goal of prevention of danger and early detection of abnormality, and expansion of ADL ( action in daily life ) and self‐support, self‐help tools were also deviced.

translation.ja: その結果，完全自立となりＡＤＬはないが，入院時と比較し，かなり進歩が見られた。
translation.en: As the results, perfect self‐support was established, and there was no yet ADL, but there was considerable advance in comparison with conditions on admission.

translation.ja: 食事については，全介助から半介助となった。
translation.en: On the meal, changing from all support to half support was realized.

translation.ja: 排せつ，排尿はまだ時間を要する
translation.en: It takes much more times in excretion and urination.

translation.ja: 高血圧のためトリクロルサイアザイド（Ｉ）を１日１２ｍｇ投与されていた７８歳女性症例で，体動時回転性めまい治療のため炭酸水素Ｎａ製剤静注中に突然意識が消失した。
translation.en: A 78‐year‐old female patient is administered 12mg a day of trichlorthiazide (I) for hypertension, and suddenly loses her consciousness when intravenous administration of sodium hydrogencarbonate agent is conducted for the treatment of systematic vertigo at her body motions.

translation.ja: 本例はＩの過剰投与により低Ｋ血症などの電解質異常をきたし，洞性徐脈，心房細動，完全左脚ブロック，上室性・心室性期外収縮，など多彩な不整脈を生じるにいたったと考えた。
translation.en: It is considered that as this is a case of caused electrolyte abnormality like hypokalemia by (I) overdosage, various arrhythmia such as sinus bradycardia, auricular fibrillation, complete left bundle branch block, and supraventricular and ventricular extrasystole come to develop.

translation.ja: Ｋ補充療法のみでは不十分で，人工ペースメーカー療法が有効であった。
translation.en: It is insufficient only by K supplementary therapy, but artificial cardiac pacemaker therapy is effective.

translation.ja: 多彩な心室性不整脈発生機序としてトリガー活性の関与を考えた
translation.en: Involvement of trigger activity is regarded as a pathogenic mechanism of various ventricular arrhythmia.

translation.ja: 標記集団下痢症の概要を報告した。
translation.en: Outline of mass outbreak of diarrhea in the title is reported.

translation.ja: 園児ら９９名を対象に採取した便についてＰＣＲを行った結果，３名から標記大腸菌を検出した。
translation.en: As results of PCR on stool collected for 99 kindergartners, Escherichia coli in the title is detected from 3 persons.

translation.ja: また関係者１５５名，のべ５７９検体から標記毒素産生性，１６株を分離した。
translation.en: Toxinogenic strain in the title, 16 stocks isolated from the concerned 155 persons, total number of test 579 cases.

translation.ja: 給排水に問題はなく，原因食品も不明だが，消毒薬の未設置，汚物処理用流しとおむつ保管ケースともに園児が触れることが可能であった等，関係事項としてあげた
translation.en: There is no problem in water supply and drainage, and a cause by food is also uncertain, but non establishment of disinfectant, possible contact of kindergartner with waste disposal and diaper storage case are showed.

translation.ja: 脊椎分離症の大部分は発育期の過激なスポーツ活動などが原因となることが明らかとなった。
translation.en: Most causes of the spondylolyses were clarified by extreme sporting exercises in the period of growth.

translation.ja: 脊椎分離症の診断はＭＲＩによりＸ線診断より早期に診断が可能となり，保存療法による治療成績を著しく高めている。
translation.en: Diagnosis of the spondylolyses by MRI method bring earlier possibility than by X‐ray diagnosis, and cure effects on conservative treatments are also greatly improved.

translation.ja: 中学校検診にて腰痛を訴えた者にＭＲＩを実施したところ５１％に低輝度変化を認めた。
translation.en: Change in low luminons intensity is recognized in 51% of persons when MRI method is applied to the students of complaining the lumbago at the medical examination in a junior high school.

translation.ja: これらは腰椎装具装用または運動制限により全症例軽快した。
translation.en: These persons were improved in all cases by wearing lumbar braces or limiting exercises.

translation.ja: 中学生で明らかな原因がなく１か月以上腰痛が続く時はＭＲＩ診断を推奨する
translation.en: Diagnosis with MRI method are recommended for the students in junior high schools in case of suffering from the lumbago continuing more than one month without clear causes.

translation.ja: 近年，胆石特有の症状を有さない“無症状胆石”が多く認められる。
translation.en: Recently, "silent gallstone" without symptom with peculiar gallstone is mainly recognized.

translation.ja: 存在部位は，９５％以上が隙嚢結石であるといわれているが，総胆管結石症や肝内結石症でも無症状で発見されることもある。
translation.en: It is said that gap bag calculus is over 95%, but existing site may be discovered subclinically even in choledocholithiasis and intrahepatic calculosis.

translation.ja: 無症状胆石の治療の基本方針は経過観察である。
translation.en: Basic policy of treatment of silent gallstone is observation of progress.

translation.ja: ウルソデオキシコール酸，ケノデオキシコール酸の内服による胆石溶解療法は，適応にあったもので有効率は３０％前後である
translation.en: Gallstone dissolution therapy by internal use of ursodeoxycholic acid and chenodeoxycholic acid is corvect for adaptation, and the availability is around 30%.

translation.ja: 痛風の診断は，持続性の高尿酸血症が存在し，急性関節炎発作の際に関節液中に尿酸ソーダの針状結晶が析出し，多核白血球がこれをどん食していることを認めると確診できる。
translation.en: A case in which persistent hyperuricemia exists, needle crystals of sodium urate are deposited in synovial fluid in case of acute arthritis fit, and ingestion by polymorphonuclear leukocytes is observed, can be finally diagnosed as gout.

translation.ja: 慢性関節リウマチ，偽痛風との鑑別が必要である。
translation.en: Differentiation from chronic articular rheumatism and pseudogout is necessary.

translation.ja: また尿酸クリアランス試験により病型診断を行う。
translation.en: Disease type diagnosis is carried out by uric acid clearance study.

translation.ja: その他，合併症診断や治療ならびに経過観察に必要な検査についても述べた
translation.en: This paper also describes diagnosis and treatment for complications and tests necessary for follow‐up.

translation.ja: 現在日本で使用可能なＨ２遮断薬（Ｉ），プロトンポンプ阻害薬（ＩＩ）の１日１回投与を解説した。
translation.en: The first 1 time administration of usable H2 blocking agent (I) and proton pump inhibitor (II) in Japan at present is explained.

translation.ja: Ｉの主なものにシメチジン，ラニチジン，ファモチジンなどがあり，１日１回投与と２回投与で治癒率に差を認めない。
translation.en: There are Cimetidine, Ranitidine, Famotidine, etc. in I, and differences are not recognized at therapeutic ratio in first 1 time administration and 2 time administration.

translation.ja: 投与時間はファモチジンでは朝１回投与が優れていた。
translation.en: In Famotidine, morning 1 time administration was excellent in administration time.

translation.ja: ＩＩにはオメプラゾールとランソプラゾールがあり，時投時間による治癒率の差は認めなかった
translation.en: There were Omeprazole and Lansoprazole in II, and difference in therapeutic ratio by administration time was not recognized.

translation.ja: 中等度以上の高血圧を合併する脳血管障害患者２０例に対してリシノプリル（１０ｍｇ）を朝１回投与し，４〜８週後に血圧日内変動の観点からその有用性を検討した。
translation.en: To 20 patients with more than moderate hypertension complicated with cerebrovascular disorders, 10mg of lisinopril was continuously administered once a day in the morning, and its usefulness was studied from the viewpoint of cricadian variation blood pressure in 4 to 8 weeks.

translation.ja: 日中夜間とも均等の血圧下降が見られ，日内変動を変化させずに降圧が行われた。
translation.en: It showed equal hypotensive effects through both day and night, and did not change circadian variation.

translation.ja: 夜間血圧も過剰降圧とは考えられなかった。
translation.en: Nocturnal blood pressure was not considered as excessive hypotension.

translation.ja: 本症例は投与１年後の追跡調査でも神経症状の悪化例は見られず，良好に経過している
translation.en: These patients showed no worsening of neurological symptoms after a one‐year follow‐up survey, and progressed well.

translation.ja: 多施設共同で脳卒中患者１５８例を対象とし，標記薬剤の自覚症状，精神症候，神経症候に対する作用と降圧効果を検討するため，オープン研究を行った。
translation.en: Open study on carnaculin described above in multiinstitute cooperation was carried out for 158 patients with cerebral apoplexy to investigate its actions on their subjective symptoms, and pyschotic and neurotic syndromes, and its hypotensive effect.

translation.ja: 脳卒中に随伴する自覚症状の改善，精神症候の改善に有効性を示した。
translation.en: The effectiveness was shown for improving of subjective symptoms and psychotic syndromes accompanied by cerebral apoplexy.

translation.ja: 疾患別ではくも膜下出血で改善度が高かった。
translation.en: High improvement was shown in subarachnoid hemorrhage.

translation.ja: 急激な血圧低下は示さず，特に境界域血圧に対して，緩徐でしかも確実な降圧効果が示された
translation.en: No rapid decrease of blood pressure was seen, and slow and stable hypotensive effect obtained especially for the patients in boundary zone blood pressure.

translation.ja: 完全抗体を検出するために生理食塩水法，不完全抗体を検出するために酵素法，アルブミン法，間接抗グロブリン試験を行う。
translation.en: In order to detect a complete antibody, a physiological saline method is applied and in order to detect an incomplete antibody, an enzyme method, albumin method and indirect antiglobulin test are done.

translation.ja: 各検査法における操作上の留意点，異常反応とその対応について概説した。
translation.en: Here are outlined the points to be paid attention through the operations in each test method, and the abnormal reactions and how to deal with the reactions.

translation.ja: 不規則性抗体スクリーニングを標記試験前に実施することは不可欠である。
translation.en: It is indispensable to carry out irregular antibody screening before starting cross matching.

translation.ja: 緊急輸血に対応した標記試験のマニュアルを明確にしておく必要がある
translation.en: Cross matching manual urgent blood transfusion should be prepared.

translation.ja: プラスチック以外の非金属製の義肢装具材料について論じた。
translation.en: Artificial limb apparatus nonmental material other than plastic is discussed.

translation.ja: 天然材料，人工材料のそれぞれの種類と性質の優劣を述べた。
translation.en: This paper describes merit and demerit of property of each of natural material and artificial material.

translation.ja: 天然有機物は生物体材料であり，人工材料も天然材料を目標として，それに到達あるいは凌駕したものもある。
translation.en: Natural organic substance is biological object material, and with the aim of achieving the quality of natural material, there are some artificial materials which made achievement, or even superseded, the latter.

translation.ja: それらは人間生体に近い材料で，義肢装具材料への適切な活用が保証される必要のあることを述べた
translation.en: It is described that it it necessary that the material is close to a human organism and its adequate utilization to an aritificial limb guaranteed.

translation.ja: ２１２例（１９７０〜１９９３年）の発症は６０〜６９歳で最も多く，２０〜２９歳の女性が同年代の男性に比し多かった。
translation.en: Crisis of 212 cases ( in 1970〜1993 ) is most abounding at 60〜69‐years‐old, and females of 20〜29‐years‐old are abounding in comparison with male of the same generation.

translation.ja: ほとんどの症例は診断時３００μＵ／ｍｌ以上のＴ‐ＩＲＩ，３０％以上のインスリン結合率をもっていた。
translation.en: Almost cases shows T‐IRI over 300μU/ml and insulin binding rate over 30% in the time of diagnoses.

translation.ja: ８３％は特別な治療なしで自然治癒していた。
translation.en: Spontaneous recovery of 83% was done without special treatment.

translation.ja: 全体の４２％がＳＨ基を含む薬剤の服用歴を有し，居住地による症例の分布差は認められなかった
translation.en: Patients of 42% within the total have dose history of the drug containing SH group, and no distribution difference of the cases by residential area is observed.

translation.ja: バセドウ病に著明な高カルシウム血症を合併したまれな１症例（男，２５歳）を報告した。
translation.en: The rare case ( male, 25‐year‐old ) combining obvious hypercalcemia in Basedow's disease is reported.

translation.ja: 本症例は全身衰弱が著明で，血清カルシウム値１２．５ｍｇ／ｄｌ，カルシウムイオン３．１４ｍＥｑ／ｌと著しい高カルシウム血症を呈した。
translation.en: Systemic hyposthenia is obvious for the present case showing hyper calcemia with serum calcium value 12.5mg/dl and calcium ion 3.14mEq/l.

translation.ja: 大量の輸液によって著明な高カルシウム血症は数日以内に改善し，抗甲状腺剤投与によって血清カルシウム値は血中甲状腺ホルモンの正常化にともない正常化した。
translation.en: The obvious hypercalcemia was improved within a few days by large fluid therapy, and serum calcium value was normalized by administration of antithyroid agent with the normalization of blood level of thyroid hormone.

translation.ja: 増悪因子の検索と至適治療の重要性を強調した
translation.en: The importance of finding out exacerbation factors and optimum treatment are emphasized.

translation.ja: 透析患者の低栄養に直接関連するエネルギーと蛋白質を中心とした栄養療法の指標について概説した。
translation.en: Index to nutrition care with energy and proteins directly related for low nutrition of dialysis patients.

translation.ja: 栄養指標として主要なものは，生体内のエネルギー源（脂肪）と蛋白源（筋蛋白，内蔵蛋白）の測定である。
translation.en: A main thing for nutritional index is measurement of in vivo energy source ( fat ) and protein source ( muscle proteins and protein of internal organ ).

translation.ja: 透析患者では体蛋白が重要な指標である。
translation.en: In dialysis patient, body proteins are important index.

translation.ja: また，処方に基づいた適正な運動療法も欠かせないものであり，今後運動耐容能などの指標も必要となるであろう
translation.en: And, proper exercise therapy based on the prescription is also necessary, and indexes such as exercise tolerability will become also necessary in future.

translation.ja: 呼吸器の感染防御機構，慢性気道感染症の治療を図と表に示し，慢性気道感染症の病態と治療の原則について簡単に解説した。
translation.en: Protective mechanism for infection of resporatory organs and treatment of chronic respiratory tract infections are ullustrated in figures and tables, and disease state of the chronic respiratory tract infection and principles of treatment are briefly explained.

translation.ja: 次に，代表的な病原細菌を表にまとめ，その特徴を述べ，抗菌薬療法を病原菌別に記述した。
translation.en: Typical pathogenic bacteria are shown in a table, and specific features are explained, and antimicrobial agent therapy is described according to pathogenic microbes.

translation.ja: さらに，外来もしくは在宅治療における注意点を示した。
translation.en: Cautionary notes in domiciliary treatment and ambulatory treatment are given.

translation.ja: 最後に，慢性気道感染症に対するマクロライド少量長期療法の意義について紹介した
translation.en: The significance of macrolide in long‐term low‐dose therapy for chronic respiratory tract infection is explained.

translation.ja: 中枢性けいれんと脳内ヒスタミンレベルとの関係を解体した研究を説明した。
translation.en: This paper explains a study on the relationship between central convulsions and level of histamine in the brain.

translation.ja: 脳内ヒスタミンレベルと間代性けいれん持続時間との間には逆相関があり，強直性けいれん持続時間との間には相関はなかった。
translation.en: There was an inverse correlation between histamine levels in the brain and duration of clonic convulsion, but there was no correlation between histamine levels and duration of tonic‐clonic convultion.

translation.ja: ヒスタミンニューロン機構は間代性けいれん誘発持続時間の阻害に重要な役割を示した。
translation.en: The mechanism of histamine neurone played an importnat role in the inhibition of the duration of induced clonic convulsions.

translation.ja: 中枢作用性のＨ１受容体きっ抗薬は小児には投与すべきでない
translation.en: It was concluded that H1 receptor antagonist with CNS actions should not be administered to children below the age of 15.

translation.ja: 切開排膿後の感染性粉りゅう，せつなどの感染症を伴う皮膚小潰よう１２例に対して，白糖・ポビドンヨード配合軟膏ユーパスタを潰よう内に挿入するタンポン法で使用し，その臨床的有用性を検討した。
translation.en: For small skin ulcer of 12 cases with infectious diseases such as infectious atheroma and boils after incision and drainage, white sugar and povidone‐iodine mixed ointment EUPASTA was inserted in an ulcer by tamponing method, and clinical usefulness was examined.

translation.ja: 潰ようの大きさ，深さは，ともに有意に縮小した。
translation.en: Size and depth of an ulcer were significantly reduced.

translation.ja: 症状別改善度では，肉芽形成，表皮形成などすべての項目で１００％であった。
translation.en: Improvement of all symptoms was 100%, such as granulation formation and cutification.

translation.ja: 細菌感染は投与前３例にみられたが，投与後消失した。
translation.en: Bacterial infection was observed in 3 cases before administration and disappeared after administration.

translation.ja: 副作用はまったく認められなかった
translation.en: No side effects were noted.

translation.ja: 臨床分離７３株を対象とした。
translation.en: The subject for study was 73 clinically isolated bacteria.

translation.ja: 本キットの成績とメチシリンのＭＩＣ値との相関は良好であったが，メチシリン感受性であった４０株中１株でｍｅｃＡ遺伝子陽性となった。
translation.en: Though there was good correlation between test results of hte kit and MIC of methicillin, one of the 40 methicillin‐susceptible species of bacteria was found to be mecA gene positive.

translation.ja: 検出感度は，ＤＮＡを用いた場合と比較して，菌体を用いた場合には必ずしも十分でなかった。
translation.en: The detection sensitivity of the bacterial test was not always adequate compared with the test using DNA.

translation.ja: 検出系の同時再現性では，電気泳動の方が安定していた。
translation.en: In simultaneous repeatability, the use of electrophoresis proved a more stable system.

translation.ja: 反応温度により差を認め，日差再現性にも大きなばらつきを認めた
translation.en: There were differnces due to reaction temperatures and considerable variation in reproducibility when determined at differnt dates.

translation.ja: 一般用医薬品の法規上の特性について述べた。
translation.en: This paper described the character on laws and regulations of non‐prescription drugs.

translation.ja: つぎに，薬を使う薬学の必要性や，薬局薬剤師のための臨床薬学の点から，一般用医薬品の取扱い方について述べた。
translation.en: Next, this paper described the handling of non‐prescription drugs in view of necessity of pharmaceutical sciences using the medicine and clinical pharmacy for a pharmacist.

translation.ja: さらに，地域の薬局薬剤師における「臨床薬学」の具体的な展開について考えた。
translation.en: In addition, the concrete development of "clinical pharmacy" in a local pharmacy was considered.

translation.ja: 最後に，薬局医療学のための薬剤師教育のあり方について述べた
translation.en: Finally, this paper described ideal ways of pharmacist education for the medical treatment science.

translation.ja: 症例は５８歳女性，進行性に歩行時ふらつき，排尿障害，痴呆を呈した。
translation.en: The subject was a 58‐year‐old woman who presented progressive staggering while walking, dysuria and dementia.

translation.ja: アシクロビルにより，一時的な改善がみられた。
translation.en: Ayclovir produced a transient improvement.

translation.ja: 脳脊髄液検査で細胞・蛋白増多，単純ほう疹ウイルス抗体価上昇を認め，ＭＲＩでは両側側頭葉病変を認めた。
translation.en: Examination of cerebraspinal fluid revealed pleocytosis, elevated protein level and increased titer of the herpes simplex antiviral antibody, and MRI dipicted lesions present in the bilateral temporal lobes.

translation.ja: 頭痛・発熱その他の髄膜刺激症状を欠き，側頭葉症状が不明瞭，経過が慢性進行性であり痴呆が全景にみられたことなどが標記脳炎としては特異であると思われた
translation.en: The disease of the patient was thought to be a special case of encephalitis based ont he findings including the absence of headache, fever or other meningeal irritation symptoms, indefinite temporal lobe symptoms, chronic progressive course and dementia being predominant.

translation.ja: 日勤帯勤務の看護婦１５名を対象とし，足の形状をデジタイザーで測定するアム‐フィットを用いる方法と，足の長さに対する舟状骨粗面高の比を百分率で表したアーチ高率を測定する方法により，標記検討を行った。
translation.en: The titled examination was carried out on 15 nurses in day services by a method to use Am‐Fit which measured foot shape with digitizer and another method to measure arch height rate which was expressed by the ratio of scaphoid tuberosity to foot length in percentage.

translation.ja: 足部愁訴は８名に認めた。
translation.en: Foot complaints are recognized in 8 nurses.

translation.ja: 勤務後に足アーチ高はほぼ全例で低下し，また足部愁訴のある群ではない群に比べアーチ高の低下の割合が大きかった。
translation.en: After services, their foot arch heights lower in almost all cases, and the rates of lowering in foot height in group having foot complaints are larger than in group having no foot complaint.

translation.ja: 足アーチ高の低下が足部愁訴に影響を与えている可能性を示唆した
translation.en: This fact indicates a possibility that lowering of foot arch height influences on foot complaints.

translation.ja: 標記３症例の義務教育復学を通じて，ハンディキャップレベルでの調整を行った。
translation.en: Adjustments by the level of handicap were made through resuming conpulsory education for 3 patients.

translation.ja: 患者・家族とも，リハビリにより日常生活動作の自立度が上昇するにつれて，普通学校への復学を希望するようになった。
translation.en: Both patients and families wanted to resume education at conventional schools as the level of daily living activity increased by rehabilitation.

translation.ja: 医療側が学校，教育委員会側への障害の理解，復学後の医学的管理の役割を持つことで復学が実現した。
translation.en: Returning to school was realized by medical care, promoting understanding of handicaps in schools and boards of education, and playing positive roles in the health‐care of the children after their return to school.

translation.ja: 包括的なリハビリテーション・システムが必要であると考えられた
translation.en: A comprehensive rehabilitation system should be established.

translation.ja: ストレプトアビジンチューブ法の採用により，同一のチューブで多項目の測定ができるようになった。
translation.en: Measurement of many items in the same tube became possible by adopting streptoavidin tube method.

translation.ja: その結果測定感度の向上，再現性の向上，試薬の安定性の向上が認められた。
translation.en: As a result, improvement of measurement of sensitivity, reproducibility and stability of reagent were realized.

translation.ja: 非特異反応阻止試薬がバッファーに添加されているため，非特異反応は認められなかった。
translation.en: Nonspecific reaction was not observed because nonspecific reaction‐inhibiting reagent was added into buffer.

translation.ja: 全自動ＥＩＡ分析装置ＥＳ６００を用いることで，多数検体の一括処理が可能となる
translation.en: Package treatment of a large number of samples is thought to become possible by using full automatic EIA analytical equipment ES600.

translation.ja: Ｋａｎｓａｓ大学教育学部音楽教育音楽療法学科の歴史を調査した。
translation.en: This paper reports the history of the music education and therapy departments, faculty of education, Kansas University.

translation.ja: 本大学の設立者Ｇａｓｔｏｎ氏の死の翌年から５年間の変遷について調べた。
translation.en: Five‐year history was investigated the following year of the death of Mr. Gaston who established the university.

translation.ja: 音楽療法プログラム，指導教官，指導教官の業績，学生名・学生数などについてまとめた。
translation.en: Music therapy programs, instructors, achievements of the instructors, and names and number of students are included.

translation.ja: 本大学の音楽療法プログラムは非常によく知れわたり，多くの学生の興味を引きつけている。
translation.en: The music therapy programs of the university are well known and attract many students.

translation.ja: 本調査によって，学士及び博士過程の卒業生を含む全ての学生名簿を作ることができた
translation.en: This investigation resulted in a student list including university and doctor graduates.

translation.ja: 人工腎臓を慢性血液透析と救急・集中医療分野に分け，各分野における現状と今後の開発動向について解説した。
translation.en: Artificial kidney is used for HD chronica and emergency‐intensive medical care, and the future development trends in each field are explained.

translation.ja: まず慢性血液透析分野の治療方法にふれ，さらにセルロースから各種のプラスチックに変わりつつある膜材質の現状を解説し，抗血栓性などの生体適合性について触れた。
translation.en: In the field of HD chronica, the following are explained : Treating method by HD chronica, present situation of membrane materials where cellulose is being replaced with various kinds of plastics, and biocompatibility of antithrombosis.

translation.ja: また救急・集中医療分野における持続的血液ろ過法及び持続的血液ろ過透析法について述べた。
translation.en: In the emergency‐intensive medical care field, continuous blood filtration method and continuous blood filtration dialysis are mentioned.

translation.ja: またその治療法の概要及びポリアクリロニトリルやポリメチルメタクリレートなどが用いられている中空糸膜の特性などについて述べた
translation.en: This paper further describes the summary of cerapies, and characteristics of hollow fiber membrane in which polyacrylonitrile and poly‐methylmethacrylate are used.

translation.ja: 胃ろうを造設したイヌで，インシュリン負荷による胃酸分泌試験およびアセトアミノフェンを用いた胃排出能試験を行った。
translation.en: A gastric fistura was made in a dog, and the following were performed : Gastric‐acid secretion test by insulin load and gastric emptying test using acetaminophen.

translation.ja: 術後に減酸効果を認めたが，胃排出能には有意な変化を認めなかった。
translation.en: Effect on acid reduction was observed after operation, while significant change of gastric emptying ability was not seen.

translation.ja: 次に十二指腸潰よう穿孔例に腹腔鏡下単純閉鎖術の付加減酸手術として腹腔鏡下迷走神経切離術を行った。
translation.en: Next, on the duodenal ulcer case with perforation, vagotomy under an abdominoscope was performed as an additional operation for acid reduction to the simple closed technique under an abdominoscope.

translation.ja: 本手術により良好な減酸効果と胃排出能の高進を認めた
translation.en: By conducting this operation, good effect on acid reduction and enhancement of gastric emptying ability were obtained.

translation.ja: レクリエーション療法の一貫として行ってきたコーラスについて，アンケートを実施した。
translation.en: A questionnaire was carried out on a chorus as part of recreation therapy.

translation.ja: ７０名の患者から回答を得た。
translation.en: Seventy patients answered it.

translation.ja: 楽しかったと答えた患者が多く，その中には感情レベルでの動きが見られた患者がいた。
translation.en: Most thought the activity fun : Some were emotionally moved.

translation.ja: 患者の同意を得てビデオで撮影し，参加時の患者の様子を観察した。
translation.en: Upon approval, patients were taken by video camera to observe behavior.

translation.ja: また病棟看護者による参加前後の患者の反応と行動の記録を検討した
translation.en: At the same time, records by ward attendants on the patients before and after activites were examined.

translation.ja: 内側型及び内側・膝蓋型変形性膝関節症で高位けい骨骨切り術を施行し，術後１０年以上経過した７３例，９４膝の長期臨床成績を検討した。
translation.en: This paper presents the long‐term clinical results of 73 patients (94 knees) who had undergone high‐level cervical osteotomy for medical or medical/patellar gonarthrosis deformans 10 years or more previously.

translation.ja: 調査時，膝関節立位正面Ｘ線像で平均１７０．６度と矯正目標角度が保たれていた。
translation.en: At the time of the study, knee joint radiography (standing, front view) provided a mean value of 170.6 degree, with the target angle maintained.

translation.ja: とう痛は全例で著明改善ないし消失していた。
translation.en: Pain was either markedly relieved or absent in all cases.

translation.ja: また歩行距離は術前の２倍に増加しており，階段昇降に不自由はないことを認めた。
translation.en: Walking distance increased twice that before the operation, causing no significant problem in going up and down stairs.

translation.ja: 本術式は高齢者に十分な移動能力をもたらすと考えた
translation.en: This operation appears to provide adequate motor function to elderly patients.

translation.ja: 多発性脳梗塞患者２３例（平均６６．７±１０．３歳）を対象に桂枝ぶく苓丸の臨床効果を検討した。
translation.en: With 23 patients (aged 66.7±10.3 on average) with miltiple cerebral infarction, the clinical effectiveness of the Chinese medicine prescription, keisi‐bukuryogan, was examined.

translation.ja: 脳梗塞発症のリスクファクターと考えられる赤血球集合能およびその影響因子であるフィブリノーゲン値を改善させる作用を有することが明らかになった。
translation.en: The Chinese prescription suppressed hemagglutination, cerebral‐infarctional factor, and its associated factor, fibrinogen.

translation.ja: その作用は東洋医学的病態である「お血症候群」の重要度に依存していた。
translation.en: The action mechanism depended to the severity of the "dirty blood syndrom" as called in oriental medicine.

translation.ja: 本剤は脳梗塞の発症を抑制する可能性のあることが推測された
translation.en: The test prescription suppressed cerebral infaction.

translation.ja: ５３歳男性症例を検討した。
translation.en: We examined a case of 53‐year‐old male patient.

translation.ja: 初発症状は労作時息切れと右季肋部痛で，心カテーテルによりすでに完成した心膜炎を確認した。
translation.en: Primary symptoms were breathlessness with effort and right hypochondriac pain, and pericarditis was confirmed by cardiac catheterization.

translation.ja: 約２年の経過後，肺炎による呼吸不全にて死亡した。
translation.en: The patient died of respiratory insufficiency caused by pneumonia 2 years later.

translation.ja: 心重量は７４０ｇで著明な心膜肥厚と癒着をみた。
translation.en: The heart weight was 740g and obvious pericardiac hyperplasia with adhesion was observed.

translation.ja: 心膜は壊死組織と核異型性を有するリンパ球侵潤をみ，心筋内にも同所見を認めた。
translation.en: In the pericardium, lymphocyte permeation including sphacelus and nucleus heteromorphism were observed, and the same findings were seen for the heart muscle.

translation.ja: 傍大動脈リンパ節原の悪性リンパ腫により収縮性心膜炎に至ったと考えられた
translation.en: Constrictive pericarditis was considered to be induced by malignant lymphoma of para aortic lymph nodes.

translation.ja: 長期にわたり低蛋白食療法の効果を得ているＰａｒｋｉｎｓｏｎ病（Ｐ）の１例を報告した。
translation.en: A case of Parkinson's disease (P) which showed efficacy of prolonged low protein diet therapy was reported.

translation.ja: 発病後１０年以上経過し，レボドーパ（Ｉ）主体抗Ｐ剤の長期服用による副作用が目立った症例で，朝昼食各６ｇの低蛋白食療法の併用を行った。
translation.en: For a case of which over 10 years passed after pathopoiesis and which the adverse reactions were conspicious by prolonged administration of anti‐P ingredients based on levodopa (I), combination therapy with low protein diet of each 6g at breakfast and lunch was conducted.

translation.ja: 神経症状の安定化とＩ副作用の軽減を示した。
translation.en: Results showed stabilization of nervous symptoms and reduction of adverse reactions.

translation.ja: 本効果は２年間に渡って維持され，栄養面の障害はなく，本療法の併用がＰに対して長期的にも有用だと示唆した
translation.en: This effecacy was maintained during 2 years and no nutritional disturbance was shown, suggesting that combination of this treatment shows long‐term usefulness of P prolonged.

translation.ja: ＳＤラットの皮膚痛覚受容器（Ｒ）の単一神経放電を記録し，熱反応に対するキノホルム（Ｃ）の作用を検討した。
translation.en: Single neural discharge of the cutaneous pain receptor (R) of SD rats was recorded to examine the effects of chinoform (C) on thermal reaction.

translation.ja: ジメチルスルホキシド溶解液のみ投与の対照群の熱反応では明らかな変動を示さなかった。
translation.en: No obvious change in R was observed with thermal reaction in the control group to which a dimethyl sulfoxide solution alone was administered.

translation.ja: Ｃ投与群ではＲの活動を２４０分にわたって明らかに増強した。
translation.en: In the C‐administered group, thermal reaction clearly increased the activity of R for 240 minutes.

translation.ja: Ｃによる行動上で見られた痛覚過敏のもとにＲ活動の増強があると示唆した
translation.en: Behavioral hyperalgesia by C suggests possible increase in R activity.

translation.ja: スモン患者１０２名にしん灸治療（９．９か月，平均３２．３回）を行い，異常知覚，不定愁訴の推移を評価した。
translation.en: 102 SMON patients were treated by acupuncture and moxibustion ( 9.9 months and 32.3 months in averate ) and were observed to see the transition of their abnormal sense and uncertain complaint.

translation.ja: 異常知覚のレベル・程度については不変だったが，「ピリピリした感じ」「痛み」で５％以上改善例を示した。
translation.en: Although the level and the severity of abnormal sense remained the same, 5% or more were relieved in their "smart feeling" and "pain."Regarding

translation.ja: 不定愁訴では下痢・食欲不振・ぼうこう障害・頭痛で１割以上の改善例を示した。
translation.en: the uncertain complaint, 10% or more were relieved in their diarrhoea, anorexia, bladder disorder and headache.

translation.ja: 施術直後には「全身の軽い感じ」「つっぱりがとれた感じ」「下肢の温感」等の自覚例が認められた
translation.en: Immediately after the surgery, there were cases who felt "lightened body," "relieved cramp" and "warmth of the leg."

translation.ja: 標記に関する平成６年度の統括研究報告を行った（１９論文）。
translation.en: Integrated research reports of 1994 were made on the above issue (19 papers).

translation.ja: 未熟なニューロン壊死の機序と予防法の開発に重点を置いた。
translation.en: The research was prepared by focusing on the mechanism of immature neurone necrosis and its prevention.

translation.ja: 臨床的には，胎児期から新生児期にかけての脳循環障害の発生機序の解明，早期診断および治療法の開発を研究目的とした。
translation.en: The research clinically aimed to understand the cerebral circulation failure development mechanism for the prenatal to neonatal stage, and to develop learly diagnosis and treatment methods.

translation.ja: 前期からの妊婦・胎児・新生児の前方視的調査共同研究も継続中である
translation.en: Following the previous period, a prospective joint study on pregnant women, foetus, and newborn infants is also under way.

translation.ja: 糖尿病網膜症の発症や進展などを対象として生存時間解析を行う場合，開始時に既にイベントが生起している症例除外（左側打ち切り）を含むデータの統計解析手法について検討を行った。
translation.en: On the occasion of the survival time analysis with regard to manifestation of and progress in diabetic retinopathy, studies were carried out on a statistical analysis method to analyze data including those on the exclusion (left side exclusion) of cases in which the events occurred already.

translation.ja: その結果，通常行われる左側打ち切りを無視する解析では，生存時間分布推定に高めのバイアスが発生することが確認できた。
translation.en: As a result, it is verified that there occurs high bias in estimation of the survival time in the usual analysis in which the left side exclusion is not taken into consideration.

translation.ja: また，パラメトリックな最尤法により生存時間にワイブル分布を当てはめると，バイアスが生じる場合があることも判明した。
translation.en: And, it is shown that there occurs a bias in some cases when the Weibull distribution is applied to the survival time by the parametric maximum likelihood method.

translation.ja: リスク因子の影響をパラメトリックな方法で調整した後ノンパラメトリックな方法により基礎生存関数を推定するアプローチが有効と考えられた
translation.en: It is thought to be effective as the approach to estimate the basic survival function by the non‐parametric method after correction of the influence of risk factors by the parametric method.

translation.ja: ＪＳＣＣ勧告法を根拠としたＬＤＨ活性測定試薬「エスパ・ＬＤＨリキッド」（ニプロ）の検討を行った。
translation.en: An LDH activity determination reagent, "ESPA‐LDH Liquid" (NIPRO) which is conformed to JSCC recommendation is studied.

translation.ja: さらに現在多くの施設で採用されているＰ→Ｌ法との関係や他社のＪＳＣＣ準拠試薬との関係についても検討を行った。
translation.en: This reagent is studied on the relations with the pyruvate to lactate method which is now widely practiced by many facilities, and with the reagents which are manufactured by other companies and conformed to JSCC recommendation.

translation.ja: その結果，「エスパ・ＬＤＨリキッド」は精密度と正確性が良好でその性能を長期間維持することができる試薬であった。
translation.en: The study discloses this NIPRO's reagent is good at precision and accuracy, and its performance of LDH activity determination is maintained well for a long time.

translation.ja: またメーカー間差，Ｐ→Ｌ法の勧告法を根拠とした場合の活性値のちがいも認められた
translation.en: The study also shows the quality variation among the reagents manufactured by different companies, and the difference of LDH activity values form those obtained by pyruvate to lactate method based on JSCC recommendation are found.

translation.ja: 成人の腹部外科手術後の漢方療法について，特に吻合部狭窄に対するぶく苓散，腸閉塞に対する大建中湯および術後骨代謝障害に対する補中益気湯につき述べた。
translation.en: This paper describes the Chinese medicine therapy for adult patients who underwent and abdominal surgery, including Buku‐ryo‐san for anastomotic stricture, Dai‐kenchu‐to for intestinal atresia, and Hochu‐ekki‐to for post operative bone metabolism failure.

translation.ja: ぶく苓散は成分のぶく苓の利水作用と人参の消化吸収促進作用により通過障害を軽減する。
translation.en: Buku‐ryo‐san relieves passage failure by the diuretic effect of Buku‐ryo and the digestion and absorption promoting effect of Ginseng Radix.

translation.ja: 大建中湯は様々な面から消化管運動を促進する。
translation.en: Dai‐kenchu‐to promotes the enterokinesis through various mechanisms.

translation.ja: 補剤は術後の消化吸収能促進および新陳代謝改善に効果を有するなどを述べた
translation.en: Complementary medicines have effects to promote digestion and absorption and to improve metabolism postoperatively.

translation.ja: 急性肺塞栓患者２９名について発症前から発症後１カ月までの心電図の経時的変化を調べた。
translation.en: On 29 patients with acute pulmonary embolism, the time‐course inthe electrocardiogram was examned in the period from the time before manifestation to 1 month after manifestation.

translation.ja: 肺動脈圧が測定された１３例を収縮期肺動脈圧の高値群と低値群に分けて心電図を比較した。
translation.en: The electrocardiograms were compared by dividing 13 patients, on whom the pulmonary arterial pressure was measured, into a high value group and a low value group in the systolic pulmonary arterial pressure.

translation.ja: 発症当日に比し，翌日以降はＱＴ延長がＶ１，２において顕性化した。
translation.en: The marked prolongation of the QT interval was observed in V1,2 after the day following the manifestation in comparison with that in the day of the manifestation.

translation.ja: 肺動脈圧高値例においてＱＴ延長がより顕著であった。
translation.en: In the paeitn with the high value of the pulmonary arterial pressure, the prolongation of the QT interval was more remarkable.

translation.ja: 本症の病態把握における右側胸部誘導のＱＴ延長の有用性が示唆された
translation.en: The prolongation of the QT interval in the right chest leads is thought to be useful as the index in grasping the pathological state of this disease.

translation.ja: 在胎中，肝と腸が中心腹壁を介し体外的に観察された。
translation.en: The liver and intestine were extracorporeally observed through the central abdominal wall in the gestational age.

translation.ja: 新生児期にヘルニア修復，３歳時に心雑音のため心カテーテルを施行した。
translation.en: Hernia repair in the neonatal period and heart catheterization at the age of 3 were conducted due to a cardial murmur.

translation.ja: ２組の両側性傍脊柱静脈が下半身からの帰還を代行し，これらは本来の両奇静脈より細かった。
translation.en: Two pairs of bilateral paravertebral veins substituted for feedback from the lower body and these were smaller than both primary azygous veins.

translation.ja: 他に，右静脈と右房間の憩室形成，および大動脈下無名静脈が上記２法で確認しえた。
translation.en: Formation of diverticulum between the right vein and the right atrium and the subaortic innominate vein were identified with 2 above mentioned methods.

translation.ja: さい帯ヘルニア修復の体外循環術に際し，留意すべき合併症と考えた
translation.en: These seemed to be noticeable complications in case of extracorporeal circulation for umbilical hernia repair.

translation.ja: 症例は１８歳の男性で，血友病Ａでエイズを発症していた。
translation.en: The patient was a 18‐year‐old man, and had hemophilia A and the manifestation of AIDS.

translation.ja: 肝機能障害の悪化にて入院となった。
translation.en: The patient was hospitalized because of aggravation of the liver function failure.

translation.ja: 外来時ＨＢｓ抗体は陽性であったが入院時には陰性化しており，Ｂ型肝炎の発症を認めた。
translation.en: At the time of the visit to hospital, the positive result as to the anti‐HBsAg antibody were shown, but the negative result were shown at the time of hospitalization and the manifestation of hepatitis B was recognized.

translation.ja: ヘルパーＴ細胞の機能不全により液性免疫も影響を受け，ＨＢｓ抗体が陰性化し細胞内に潜伏していたＨＢＶが再増殖したと考えた
translation.en: It is explained that the humoral immunity was also influenced by the dysfunction of helper T cells, that the anti‐HBsAg antibody show negative, and that the intracellular HBV grew again.

translation.ja: ラットでキノホルムの毒性に対して遺伝的に感受性の高いラット（ＣＳ）と低いラット（ＣＲ）を用いて，キノホルムを３４０日以上にわたって投与し，スモン発症を試みた。
translation.en: Chinoform was administered to the following two types of rats for more than 340 days to see the SMON onset : In the use of CS‐rat with genetically high sensitivity for chinoform toxicity, and CR‐rat with low sensitivity.

translation.ja: ＣＳは雄１２匹中５匹，雌８匹中３匹が生き残った。
translation.en: In CS, 5 out of 12 males and 3 out of 8 females survived.

translation.ja: ＣＲは雄１２匹中３匹，雌９匹中２匹が生き残った。
translation.en: In CR, 3 out of 12 males and 2 out of 9 females survived.

translation.ja: これらの生き残ったラットの内，ＣＳの雄３匹，ＣＲの雄１匹において，四肢の上げ下げが緩慢で脱力の著しい症状を観察した
translation.en: Among those survived, 3 male CS and 1 male CR showed remarkable weakness such as sluggish limb movement and lassitude.

translation.ja: 特異な形態を示したＳｔａｎｆｏｒｄ　Ａ型（Ｄｅ　Ｂａｋｅｙ　ＩＩ型）の解離性大動脈りゅうの１例（女，８５歳）を経験した。
translation.en: A case (85‐year‐old female) with dissecting aneurysm of the aorta of the Standord A type with a unique form (De Bakey II type) is experienced.

translation.ja: 主訴は呼吸困難と胸痛で，血液培養で敗血症と診断した。
translation.en: Chief complaints were dyspnea and pectoralgia and the case was diagnosed as septicemia based on the blood culture results.

translation.ja: 抗生剤を投与したが，突然のショック状態となり，心・呼吸停止となり死亡した。
translation.en: Though antibiotics were administered, sudden shock state and cardiac and respiratory arrest were caused and the patient was dead.

translation.ja: 本症は敗血症に伴うショック状態とその後の血圧の急激な上昇がりゅう破裂に至る原因になったと考えた
translation.en: It was indicated that shock state followed by septicemia and succeeding acute rise in blood pressure resulted in rupture of aneurysm.

translation.ja: Ｔｕｍｏｒ　Ｄｏｒｍａｎｃｙ（ＴＤ）の概念及びＴＤと血管新生との関連に関するＤｒ．Ｊ．Ｆｏｌｋｍａｎの講演内容について述べた。
translation.en: This paper describes Dr.J.Folkman's lecture both on the concept of tumor dormancy (TD) and on the relation between TD and angiogenesis.

translation.ja: ヒトにおけるＴｕｍｏｒ　Ｄｒｏｍａｎｃｙの例として，原発巣摘出後年月を経て転移が出現する乳癌について述べた。
translation.en: As a human clinical case of TD, breast cancer whose metastasis appears in many years after primary tumor nests has been extracted is described.

translation.ja: 動物実験モデルでは，血管新生を抑制することによって腫ようを不活動状態，即ちｄｏｒｍａｎｔな状態に置くことが出来る。
translation.en: It is possible to put tumors in inactive condition or in dormant condition by suppressing angiogenesis in experimental animal models.
